openTicket.title: ZSMP TICKET SYSTEM
openTicket.description:
<:tick1:1244367270629605508> **Reason:**
> Click on the button below to open a ticket, and then select the correct reason for support!


<:tick2:1244367269258199181>  **Active times**
> Our dedicated staff team is ready to support you in the following times: <t:1716724800:t> as <t:1716699600:t>, but be patient!

 <:tick3:1244367267672752180>  **Warning**
> In order to avoid more problems, if you have a complaint, you need to file it within 7 days after the incident or it will not be valid
